content.html: With ADHD you have to figure out "brain hacks" just to perform the basic functions of survival. Example: I recently moved house and am now having to put a bunch of energy into just figuring out new ways of drinking enough water throughout the day.
content.value:
With ADHD you have to figure out "brain hacks" just to perform the basic functions of survival.

Example: I recently moved house and am now having to put a bunch of energy into just figuring out new ways of drinking enough water throughout the day.
